description._content: ID: 063538 Title: 'The holi bible'. The Bishops Bible. Provenance: Richarde Iugge; London, 1569 Caption: Title page of a bible. Known as the Bishop's bible. Notes: The titlepage bears a woodcut portrait of Queen Elizabeth enthroned between Justice and Mercy. The titlepage is printed on vellum and coloured. Image taken from 'The holi bible'. The Bishops' Bible. Source identifier: G.12188, title page British Library Shelfmark: G.12188 If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of this image, please place an order at Images Online imagesonline.bl.uk. The details from the above list should help you locate the images.
